title: Tata Power to invest up to $9 billion to expand renewable energy capacity
description: Tata Power plans a significant investment of up to $9 billion to boost its renewable energy capacity from the current 5 gigawatts to over 20 gigawatts within five to six years. The company aims for 100% clean power generation by fiscal year 2045 through a combination of solar, wind, battery storage, and pumped storage solutions.
